name: Hyakorsk
description:
In the world of Hyakorsk, explore the decay of an ancient doomed civilisation, solve puzzles and battle, bash and bonk fiends. Inspired by games such as Legend of Zelda, Hyperlight Drifter and Hob, Tadpole Games hopes to deliver an action-adventure experience set in a stylised world of ruin where creatures have been mutated into mushroom monsters. Play as a frog ronin as you adventure forth to discover the dark secrets of Hyakorsk...

How to Play

Embark on your quest as the last survivor of your destroyed frog village, using your handy staff and vengeful determination to fight through enemies. With an additional laser pointer, you must direct your newfound companion to solve puzzles and finally unearth Hyakorsk’s lost mysteries.
